situation.title: Blood donators
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for blood and plasma donation COVID-19.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Donating blood is as important in times of pandemic as in times without crisis. Particularly rare blood groups AB and B are long-term deficient.

For more information about blood donation

Conditions for blood donation

List of transfusion stations

Donation of convalescent plasma COVID-19

If you have recently had COVID-19 and want to help patients with severe symptoms, you can donate blood plasma. It contains protein antibodies and can help save lives.

List of collection points

questions_answers.question: Can I donate during a pandemic?
questions_answers.value: Yes, it's even more important than before.

questions_answers.question: What are the conditions for donating convalescent blood plasma after undergoing COVID-19?
questions_answers.value: The collection point will inform you about the conditions of the donation.
